372.description: Creates & revises definitions; specifies rulemaking powers of FSC; includes in-house loan processors in disciplinary provisions; provides that specified provisions do not apply to licensed contract loan processor who has on file with OFR declaration of intent to act solely as contract loan processor; provides restrictions on employment of persons acting as in-house loan processors; clarifies provisions concerning operation of mortgage brokers; revises provisions relating to disclosure of settlement charges & loan terms, etc.

373.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
373.title: Retirement
373.description: Revises provisions relating to employment after retirement; provides that retiree of state-administered retirement system who retires on or after certain date may not be reemployed by employer that participates in state-administered retirement system & receive both salary for employment & retirement benefits; requires that retiree who retires on or after certain date & who is reemployed within 6 calendar months after retirement apply to establish future retirement date, etc.

374.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
374.title: Use of Public Moneys and Property
374.description: Prohibits use of public funds for certain purposes benefiting professional sports team; provides exceptions; provides for ad valorem taxation of property owned by governmental entity if property is used by private entity for nonexempt purpose.

375.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
375.title: 40th Anniversary/U.S. End of Involvement/Vietnam
375.description: Designates March 25, 2013, the 40th anniversary of the end of the United States' involvement in the Vietnam War, as a legal holiday; provides for annual observance of "Vietnam Veterans' Day," commencing on a specified date; requires DVA to administratively promote & support efforts of counties, municipalities, & veterans' organizations that voluntarily hold special community events commemorating 40th anniversary of end of U.S. involvement in Vietnam & subsequent observances of Vietnam Veterans' Day, etc.

377.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
377.title: Traffic Safety
377.description: Creates Minor Traffic Safety Act; prohibits use of handheld cellular telephones & other electronic communications devices by drivers under 18 years of age & persons driving school buses; provides for voluntary checkoff on driver's license applications to permit contributions to AAA Foundation for Traffic Safety; requires DHSMV to issue distinctive placard when issuing or reissuing driver's license to person under certain age; requires such person to display placard at all times while operating motor vehicle, etc.

379.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
379.title: Production and Shipment of Wine
379.description: Authorizes direct shipment of wine into & within this state for personal consumption only; provides legislative intent; requires licensure of winery shippers by Division of Alcoholic Beverages & Tobacco; provides license requirements; requires recipients of direct shipment of wine to be at least 21 years of age; requires proof of age of recipient; provides for payment of taxes, monthly report, & recordkeeping by winery shippers; provides requirements for common carriers that make deliveries of wine, etc.

380.last_action: Withdrawn prior to introduction, companion bill(s) passed, see CS/HB 997 (Ch.
380.title: Juvenile Civil Citations
380.description: Requires creation of juvenile civil citation program to divert juveniles from secure placement with DJJ; requires program be created at local level by local law enforcement agency with concurrence of others; restricts eligibility to juveniles with no more than two misdemeanors; requires law enforcement officer to issue report if juvenile has not complied with program requirements; requires probation officer to process original delinquent act as referral to DJJ, etc.

381.title: Teaching Agency for Home and Community-Based Care
381.description: Authorizes DEA to designate home health agency as teaching agency for home & community-based care; establishes criteria for qualification; authorizes teaching agency to be affiliated with academic research university that meets certain criteria & academic health center.

382.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
382.title: Mobile Home and Recreational Vehicle Parks
382.description: Specifies laws & rules to be enforced by DOH; provides for adoption of rules; revises applicability of recreational vehicle park requirements to mobile home parks; revises permit requirements; provides requirements for construction review & approval for private parks & camps; requires certain construction & renovation plans to be submitted to department for review & approval; revises requirements for permit applications; revises fees charged to operators of certain parks or camps, etc.

383.title: Building Construction and Inspection
383.description: Exempts rules that adopt federal standards & certain updates of or amendments to Florida Building Code or Florida Fire Prevention Code from requirement that Legislature ratify any rule that has adverse impact or regulatory costs which exceed certain criteria; specifies national codes to form foundation for state building standards & codes; revises provisions for amendment or modification of foundation code; revises criteria for approval by Florida Building Commission of technical amendments to code, etc.

384.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
384.title: Use of Cigarette Tax Proceeds
384.description: Revises payment & distribution of funds in Cigarette Tax Collection Trust Fund; provides specified purposes for use of funds that are appropriated out of trust fund; authorizes moneys transferred to Board of Directors of H. Lee Moffitt Cancer Center & Research Institute to be used to secure financing to pay costs related to constructing, furnishing, equipping, & maintaining clinical facilities for cancer research.

385.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
385.title: Removal of Prohibited Discharges
385.description: Provides requirements for removal of certain pollutant discharges; provides for DEP to authorize use of dispersants & other spill-mitigating substances; requires DEP to monitor & make certain information available to public; provides criteria for adoption of rules by DEP; requires DEP to submit report to Legislature.

386.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
386.title: City of Parkland, Broward County
386.description: Extends & enlarges corporate limits of city; provides effective date for annexation; transfers public roads & rights-of-way.

387.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
387.title: Broward County
387.description: Authorizes municipalities in Broward County to levy special assessments to fund law enforcement services; provides for reduction in ad valorem taxes when law enforcement special assessment is levied pursuant to this act.

388.title: North Springs Improvement District, Broward County

390.title: Town of Southwest Ranches, Broward County
390.description: Amends town's charter to remove inapplicable provisions & make ministerial changes; provides further description of town's rural residential character; eliminates previously repealed language; provides additional language relating to filling council vacancies; clarifies that only town council is required to vote by roll call; clarifies that roll call vote is required by town council on all land use & quasi-judicial items.

392.title: Manatee County Port Authority
392.description: Provides for conveyance of title to submerged lands adjacent to port authority's boundaries from Board of Trustees of Internal Improvement Trust Fund; defines territorial boundaries of submerged lands.

393.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
393.title: Procurement of Personal Property and Services
393.description: Defines "off-the-shelf commodity"; authorizes agencies & eligible users to use request for quote to obtain written pricing from any qualified vendor for purchase of off-the-shelf commodities; authorizes agencies & eligible users to purchase off-the-shelf commodities otherwise available under purchasing agreements & state term contracts under specified conditions; requires agencies & eligible users to purchase generic equivalent of brand name off-the-shelf commodities unless adequate justification can be provided for purchase of similar brand name products.

394.last_action: Died in Conference Committee, companion bill(s) passed, see CS/HB 143 (Ch.
394.title: Corporate Tax Credits and Refunds
394.description: Authorizes OTTED to administer corporate income tax credits for spaceflight projects; authorizes DOR to share information relating to corporate income tax credits for spaceflight projects with OTTED; revises order in which credits against corporate income tax or franchise tax may be taken; requires that amount taken as credit for spaceflight project be added to taxable income; prohibits deduction from taxable income for net operating loss taken as credit against corporate income taxes or transferred, etc.

395.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
395.title: Nonpublic Postsecondary Educational Institutions
395.description: Requires disclosure of institution accreditation status to prospective students; provides restrictions relating to advertising by licensed institutions; requires notification of change in accreditation status; revises standards by which Commission for Independent Education evaluates institutions for licensure; requires licensure of certain institutions offering postsecondary education through distance or correspondence education.

396.last_action: Unfavorable by Business and Consumer Affairs Subcommittee, laid on Table; YEAS 1 NAYS 12 -HJ 1982
396.title: Title Loans
396.description: Exempts certain persons from specified financial & lending regulations adopted by counties & municipalities; provides that regulation of title loans is preempted to state; transfers regulation of title loans from OFR to DOACS; prohibits certain activities at or within certain proximity of title loan offices; provides for deposit of certain moneys in General Inspection Trust Fund; revises grounds for disciplinary action against title loan lenders, etc.

397.title: Targeted Economic Development
397.description: Provides that capital investment tax credit may be carried forward for use against corporate income tax in specified years after commencement of operations of project; redefines term "target industry business" to revise eligibility criteria for tax refund program for target industry businesses; requires certain local governing boards to notify OTTED & EFI of average private-sector wage calculation to be used for purposes of business's wage commitment under tax refund program, etc.

398.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
398.title: Postsecondary Education
398.description: Deletes provisions relating to CLAST & use of test scores for student college-level communication & computation skills; provides requirements relating to articulation & establishes Articulation Coordinating Committee; revises provisions relating to eligibility to substitute requirements for admission to or graduation from institution; revises provisions relating to requirements of common placement testing program; revises provisions relating to approval of community service work for eligibility for Bright Futures award.

399.title: Public Lodging/Public Food Service Establishments
399.description: Excludes nonprofit organizations providing certain housing from definition of "public lodging establishment"; prohibits local governments from regulating, restricting, or prohibiting vacation rentals based solely on their classification, use, or occupancy; revises authority preempted to state with regard to regulation of public lodging establishments & public food service establishments; provides that public lodging establishments formerly classified as resort condominiums & resort dwellings are classified as vacation rentals, etc.

400.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
400.title: Residential Property Insurance
400.description: Revises costs to be included in rate filing; revises overall premium increase for rate filing; revises information that must be included in rate filing relating to reinsurance; deletes provision prohibiting insurer from implementing rate increase within 6 months before it makes certain rate filings; deletes provision prohibiting insurer from filing for rate increase within 6 months after it makes certain rate filings.

401.title: Communications Services Tax
401.description: Requires that dealer compute communications services tax based on rounding algorithm; provides criteria; provides for application of tax; provides options to dealer for applying rounding algorithm; authorizes dealer to apply rounding algorithm to aggregate tax amount under certain conditions; provides that dealer is not required to collect tax based on bracket system; removes provision requiring DOR to make available tax amounts & applicable brackets, etc.

402.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
402.title: County Government Funding
402.description: Provides circumstances under which board of county commissioners may use certain revenues for purpose other than that specified by law; defines eligible county; specifies that county eligibility must be determined annually & exercised for limited time; prohibits certain revenues from being used under act.

403.last_action: Laid on Table, companion bill(s) passed, see CS/CS/SB 1430 (Ch.
403.title: Regulation of Smoking
403.description: Authorizes school districts to restrict smoking on school district property.

404.last_action: Withdrawn prior to introduction, companion bill(s) passed, see SB 2156 (Ch.
404.title: Division of Emergency Management
404.description: Transfers intact Division of Emergency Management from Department of Community Affairs to Executive Office of Governor.

405.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
405.title: Youth Athletic Coaches
405.description: Requires certain sanctioning bodies to disqualify person from acting as coach for remainder of season if that person is removed from game by official.

407.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
407.title: City of Vero Beach, Indian River County
407.description: Provides that city utility is public utility for certain purposes & subject to jurisdiction of Florida Public Service Commission; requires that city set fair, just, & reasonable rates; prescribes criteria for establishing revenue requirement; provides that PSC has authority to enforce provisions of act; provides circumstances under which utility is not public utility & not required to comply with act.

408.title: Household Moving Services
408.description: Provides for biennial renewal of mover & moving broker registrations; authorizes DOACS to extend registration expiration dates in order to establish staggered dates; requires calculation of biennial registration fees based on annual rate; deletes provision requiring certain movers & moving brokers to obtain local license or registration & pay state registration fee; prohibits mover or moving broker from conducting business without being registered with DOACS; preempts local ordinances & regulations except in certain counties, etc.

409.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
409.title: Inspectors General
409.description: Provides that Chief Inspector General is responsible for all agency inspectors general, including cabinet agencies & EOG; houses office of Chief Inspector General in EOG for administrative purposes only; provides that Chief Inspector General reports to Cabinet; revises definitions; provides responsibilities & duties for Chief Inspector General & agency inspectors general; directs DMS to adopt criteria for use of purchasing cards; requires agency inspector general to conduct periodic audits of use of such cards.

410.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
410.title: Tax Refund Program/Target Industry Businesses
410.description: Revises eligibility of qualified target industry businesses for tax refunds; authorizes tax refunds for certain businesses that make capital investments in project; revises application requirements & qualifications for review of applications by OTTED.

411.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
411.title: Transfer of Tax Liabillity
411.description: Revises provisions relating to tax liability when person transfers or quits business; provides that transfer of assets of business or stock of goods of business is considered transfer of business; requires DOR to provide notification to business before circuit court shall temporarily enjoin business; provides that transferees of business are liable for certain taxes unless specified conditions are met; requires DOR to conduct certain audits relating to tax liability of transferors & transferees of business, etc.

413.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
413.title: Bedding Materials
413.description: Cites this act as the "Safe and Hygienic Bedding Act." Prohibits a person from manufacturing or selling bedding that is made in whole or in part from secondhand material unless such material has been sanitized, germicidally treated, or cleaned using a method approved by the DOACS. Requires that all bedding manufactured, renovated, sanitized, or sold in this state which contains secondhand materials bear a clear and conspicuous label affixed to the bedding which contains specified information, etc.

414.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
414.title: Developmental Disabilities
414.description: Establishes Developmental Disabilities Savings Program to allow for advance payment of services for children who have developmental disabilities & will be ineligible for certain services due to age; provides that program may not be implemented until certain legal opinions are obtained; establishes Developmental Disabilities Savings Program Board to administer savings program.

415.title: Pub. Rec./Records Held by Public Airports
415.description: Provides exemption from public records requirements for proprietary confidential business information & trade secrets held by public airport & for any proposal or counterproposal exchanged between public airport & nongovernmental entity relating to sale, use, development, or lease of airport facilities; provides for expiration of exemptions & review & repeal thereof; provides finding of public necessity.

416.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
416.title: Disposition of Human Remains
416.description: Defines terms relating to disposition of human remains; revises procedures for reporting & disposition of unclaimed remains; prohibits certain uses or dispositions of remains of deceased persons whose identities are not known; requires that local governmental contracts for final disposition of unclaimed remains comply with certain federal regulations; revises procedures for anatomical board's retention of human remains before their use; provides for claims by, & release of human remains to, legally authorized persons after payment of certain expenses, etc.

417.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
417.title: Sentencing of Inmates
417.description: Creates reentry program for nonviolent offenders to divert them from long periods of incarceration; requires intensive substance abuse treatment & rehabilitative program; provides for minimum length of service in program; specifies eligibility criteria; directs DOC to obtain sentencing court approval before placement; requires DOC to notify state attorney & authorizes state attorney to object to placement, etc.

418.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
418.title: Nursing Services
418.description: Requires hospitals to establish nurse staffing collaborative councils; requires council to produce annual hospital nurse staffing plans; requires chief nurse executive to communicate with council to ensure appropriate implementation of nurse staffing plan; requires council to conduct semiannual review of nurse staffing plan; requires nurse staffing plan to be reviewed with nursing personnel.

419.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
419.title: Early Voting
419.description: Expands list of available sites at which early voting may be held to include specified facilities or any other location designated by supervisor of elections as meeting requirements of state law; deletes requirement that early voting site be designated & used as such for at least 1 year before election; provides requirements for determining number of early voting sites each county must operate; expands early voting hours to 12 hours per weekday & 12 hours in aggregate each weekend at each site during applicable periods.

420.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
420.title: Public Works Projects
420.description: Prohibits state & political subdivisions that contract for construction, maintenance, repair, or improvement of public works from imposing certain conditions on certain contractors, subcontractors, material suppliers, or carriers; provides exception; prohibits state & political subdivisions from restricting qualified bidders from submitting bids, being awarded any bid or contract, or performing work on public works project; revises written protest filing requirements for protests to contract solicitations or awards.

422.last_action: Laid on Table, companion bill(s) passed, see SB 1142 (Ch.
422.title: Adverse Possession
422.description: Specifies that occupation & maintenance of property satisfies requirements for possession for purposes of gaining title to property via adverse possession without color of title; requires person seeking property by adverse possession to use uniform adverse possession return provided by DOR; requires property appraiser to notify owner of record of claim; requires person claiming adverse possession to attest to truthfulness of information; requires appraiser to add certain information related to claim to information on tax roll, etc.

423.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
423.title: Retail Sales Establishments
423.description: Encourages retail sales establishments to have functioning automated external defibrillator; requires training, maintenance, & location registration; provides immunity from liability under Good Samaritan Act & Cardiac Arrest Survival Act; authorizes DBPR to adopt rules.

424.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
424.title: Sale/Lease /County, District, Municipal Hospital
424.description: Requires Legislature to approve sale or lease of county, district, or municipal hospital to not-for-profit Florida corporation.

425.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
425.title: Employee Leasing Companies
425.description: Requires employee licensing company to carry workers' compensation & provide notice when employee leasing agreement is terminated; requires client company to provide certain written information regarding certain contractual relationships; sets deadline to provide notice when client company enters into subcontractor agreements; requires employee leasing company to secure workers' compensation before obtaining or renewing license; provides circumstances requiring person to become employee of leasing company, etc.

426.title: Health Care Price Transparency
426.description: Authorizes primary care provider to publish & post schedule of certain charges for medical services offered to patients; requires schedule to include certain information regarding medical services offered; provides that schedule may group provider's services by price levels & list services in each price level; provides exemption from license fee & continuing education requirements for provider who posts schedule of charges; requires primary care provider's estimates of charges for medical services to be consistent with posted schedule, etc.

427.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
427.title: Auditory-Oral Education Programs
427.description: Cites act as "Auditory-Oral Education Act"; provides that parent of child who is deaf or hard of hearing may enroll child in auditory-oral education program at school that meets specified requirements as part of public school choice options; requires that level of services be determined by IEP plan team or individualized family support plan team; revises provisions relating to funding model for exceptional student education programs to require DOE to revise descriptions of services & supports used to determine exceptional student education cost factors.

428.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
428.title: State Financial Matters
428.description: Prohibits agency or branch of state government, without legislative authority, from contracting to pay liquidated damages or early termination fees resulting from breach or early termination of contract or agreement, from paying interest because of insufficient budget authority to pay obligation in current year, from obligating state to make future payments to cover unpaid balances, or from granting party right to collect fees or other revenues from nonparties, etc.

429.last_action: Laid on Table, companion bill(s) passed, see CS/CS/SB 1196 (Ch.
429.title: Construction Liens
429.description: Specifies that lessor's interest in property is not subject to construction lien for improvements made by lessee if certain documents containing specific information & meeting certain criteria are recorded in official records of county before recording of notice of commencement; authorizes certain contractors & lienors to demand that lessor serve verified copies of lease prohibiting liability for improvements made by lessee; subjects interest of lessor to specified lien for failing to serve such verified copies or serving false or fraudulent copy, etc.

430.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
430.title: Capital Formation for Infrastructure Projects
430.description: Creates Florida Infrastructure Fund Partnership; provides for management of partnership by Florida Opportunity Fund; authorizes fund to lend moneys to partnership; requires partnership to raise funds from investment partners; provides for commitment agreements with & issuance of certificates to investment partners; authorizes partnership to invest in certain infrastructure projects; prohibits partnership from pledging credit or taxing power of state; prohibits investments with certain companies, etc.

431.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
431.title: Growth Management
431.description: Authorizes Fish and Wildlife Conservation Commission, in cooperation with other specified state agencies, to provide assistance to landowners & local governments in implementing provisions relating to rural land stewardship areas; revises criteria for establishing rural land stewardship area; revises provisions relating to transferrable land use credits; revises credit limitations; provides legislative findings & intent; prohibits state land planning agency from adopting certain rules, etc.

432.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
432.title: Property Insurance Appraisers/Appraisal Umpires
432.description: Provides license application, issuance, biennial renewal, or continuation fees for property insurance appraisal umpires & property insurance appraisers; defines terms "property insurance loss appraiser" & "property insurance appraisal umpire" for purposes of Licensing Procedures Law; provides that property insurance appraisal umpires & property insurance appraisers are subject to powers of DFS, FSC, & OIR; requires that property insurance appraisal umpires & property insurance appraisers operating in this state be licensed by department, etc.

433.title: Pest Control
433.description: Provides rule changes that allow operators to provide certain emergency notice to DOACS by facsimile or electronic means; increases minimum bodily injury & property damage insurance coverage required for pest control businesses; provides for licensure by DOACS of pest control customer contact centers; provides application requirements; provides for fees, licensure renewal, penalties, & licensure expiration; provides for certification of commercial wildlife trappers, etc.

434.title: Recording of Real Property Documents
434.description: Establishes that real property electronic documents accepted for recordation are validly recorded; provides legislative intent; provides for prospective & retroactive application.

436.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
436.title: Performing Arts Centers
436.description: Provides alternative requirement for DOR to distribute certain sales tax proceeds to certain performing arts centers rather than to certain sports franchise facilities; provides for construction; provides limitation; requires OTTED to screen applicants & approve or deny applications for certification as performing arts centers for funding purposes; requires OTTED to establish certain procedures & guidelines; provides criteria for certification of performing arts centers, etc.

437.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
437.title: Fire Prevention and Control
437.description: Defines term "light-frame truss-type construction"; provides for installation of signs or symbols at entrances to certain areas.

438.last_action: Laid on Table, companion bill(s) passed, see CS/CS/SB 1366 (Ch.
438.title: Licensure/Monitoring/Mental Health/Substance Abuse
438.description: Requires DCFS, DOH, APD, AHCA, community-based care lead agencies, managing entities, & contracted monitoring agents to adopt policies for administrative, licensure, & programmatic monitoring of mental health & substance abuse service providers; limits frequency of administrative, licensure, & programmatic monitoring of mental health & substance abuse service providers under certain conditions; exempts federal certification & precertification reviews from certain monitoring requirements; provides for documentation to be posted on data warehouse.

439.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
439.title: Service Charges on State Trust Funds
439.description: Reduces service charge applicable to Clerks of the Court Trust Fund; deletes obsolete provisions.

440.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
440.title: State Road Designations
440.description: Designates Stark Memorial Drive in Duval County; directs DOT to erect suitable markers.

441.title: Florida Tax Credit Scholarship Program
441.description: Revises provisions relating to amount of tax credit allowed for contribution made to eligible nonprofit scholarship-funding organization; revises provisions relating to carryforward of unused amount of tax credit & rescindment of all or part of tax credit under Florida Tax Credit Scholarship Program.

442.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
442.title: Personal Injury Protection Insurance
442.description: Provides circuit court has exclusive original jurisdiction involving challenges to arbitration under No-Fault Law; requires requests for disclosure to be by certified mail; requires insured to comply with policy as condition precedent to benefits; revises references to Medicare Part B; requires insurer to notify provider of improperly completed form & provide opportunity to complete form; requires assignee of benefits to cooperate; requires provider assigned benefits to submit to examination under oath, etc.

443.last_action: Withdrawn from Economic Development and Tourism Subcommittee; Finance and Tax Committee; Economic Affairs Committee
443.title: Convention Development Taxes
443.description: Authorizes increase in rate of charter county convention development tax; specifies permissible uses of additional revenues.

444.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
444.title: Motor Vehicle Operation
444.description: Prohibits smoking in motor vehicle in which certain minors are passengers.

445.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
445.title: Southwest Florida Fire District/Collier County
445.description: Creates Southwest Florida Fire Control and Rescue District as independent special district; provides for future merger of districts; provides legislative intent; provides purpose of district; provides boundaries; provides for governing body; provides powers of district; provides that district may levy ad valorem taxes & non-ad valorem assessments; authorizes district to borrow money; provides for impact fees; provides for elections; provides that district may exercise power of eminent domain, etc.

446.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
446.title: Chief Financial Officer
446.description: Requires governmental & statutorily created entities to maintain their financial data in accordance with requirements of CFO; requires CFO to adopt charts of accounts & related procedures; requires charts of accounts to be reviewed & updated; requires CFO to adopt certain procedures relating to charts of accounts; provides declaration of state interest.

447.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
447.title: Sentencing in Capital Felonies
447.description: Requires that advisory sentence of death be made by unanimous recommendation of jury following defendant's conviction or adjudication of guilt for capital felony or capital drug trafficking felony; requires that court enter sentence notwithstanding unanimous recommendation of jury.

448.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
448.title: Bicycle Safety
448.description: Revises safety standard requirements for bicycle helmets that must be worn by certain riders & passengers; provides for enforcement of requirements for bicycle lighting equipment.

449.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
449.title: Juvenile Justice
449.description: Requires additional risk assessment points for child on specified status charged with new offense; provides that child may continue to be detained if he or she violates conditions of home detention; provides that child may be detained for failure to appear at any hearing, not just adjudicatory hearings; revises periods that child may be detained for failure to appear at hearing; provides additional detention for child who fails to appear & has previously failed to appear at two or more hearings, etc.

450.title: Hillsborough County
450.description: Defers future repeal of ch. 2004-414, Laws of Florida, which relates to projects for which payment & performance bonds may be waived for construction of public building, for prosecution & completion of public work, or for repairs on public building or public work when cost of project is at or below certain threshold & contract for construction, completion, or repair is awarded pursuant to economic development program established to encourage local small businesses to participate in county procurement programs.

451.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
451.title: Optional Sector Plans
451.description: Increases minimum size of geographic areas that qualify for use of optional sector plans; revises terminology relating to plans; deletes obsolete provisions; revises content required to be included in conceptual long-term overlay plans & detailed specific area plans; requires identification of water development projects & transportation facilities to serve future development needs; exempts certain developments from requirement to develop detailed specific area plan, etc.

452.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
452.title: Physical Education Instruction in Public Schools
452.description: Requires that physical education instruction for students be delivered by certified physical education teacher; requires that school district implement such requirement during 5-year period; provides that student may have physical education requirement waived for one semester each year under certain circumstances.

453.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
453.title: Environmental Regulation
453.description: Prohibits county from requiring applicant to obtain permit or approval from another state or federal agency as condition of processing development permit under certain conditions; requires that DEP review application for certain permits under Beach & Shore Preservation Act & request additional information within specified time; specifies that s. 403.0874, F.S., authorizing expedited permitting, applies to provisions governing coastal construction; revises requirements for inclusion of certain goals & objectives in Florida Seaport Mission Plan, etc.

454.title: Rulemaking
454.description: (THIS BILL COMBINES CS/CS/H993 & H7239) Requires that agency include in its notice of intended rulemaking statement whether proposed rule will require legislative ratification; provides for withdrawal of adopted rule that is not ratified by Legislature; clarifies that certain proposed rules are effective only when ratified by Legislature; reduces time before agency files rule for adoption within which agency must notify person who submitted lower cost alternative & Administrative Procedures Committee, etc.

455.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
455.title: Revenue-Neutral Tax Reform
455.description: Replaces revenue from required local effort school property tax with revenue from state sales tax increase; provides legislative intent & findings; provides for 2.5 cent increase in tax on sales, use, & other transactions as replacement for required local effort school property tax; revises brackets for calculating sales tax amounts; provides for reservation & allocation of revenues from additional 2.5 cent increase in tax rate, etc.

457.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
457.title: Public Depositories
457.description: Revises definitions applicable to Florida Security for Public Deposits Act; conforms terminology to changes made by act; revises credit union reporting requirements; revises evidence of insurance required to be submitted by public depositor to CFO.

458.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
458.title: Permitting of Consumptive Uses of Water
458.description: Requires consumptive use permits to be issued for period of 20 years; provides exception; eliminates requirements for permit compliance reports; removes authority of DEP & governing boards to modify or revoke consumptive use permits; provides for modification of existing consumptive use permits; provides requirements for water management districts in evaluating applications for consumptive use of water in mandatory reuse zones; requires water management districts to implement sustainable water use permit program, etc.

459.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
459.title: Collection of Delinquent Financial Obligations
459.description: Authorizes board of county commissioners or governing body of municipality to pursue collection of certain delinquent obligations to which it is entitled or refer account to other specified individuals for collection; authorizes collection fee & attorney's fee to be added to outstanding balance that is referred for collection; limits amount that may be added to outstanding balance of account referred for collection.

460.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
460.title: Murder of a Child 17 Years Of Age or Younger
460.description: Provides for reclassification of specified murder offenses if committed upon child 17 years of age or younger; prohibits court from suspending, deferring, or withholding adjudication of guilt or imposition of sentence.

461.title: Insurer Insolvency
461.description: Amends provisions relating to Insurance Capital Build-Up Incentive Program; provides for renegotiation of surplus notes issued before specified date; revises surplus requirements for assuming insurers in connection with reinsurance credits; provides for rehabilitation plans for title insurers; provides for surcharges on title insurance policies to collect amount needed to cover assessment for insolvent insurer; authorizes DFS to request appointment as ancillary receiver if necessary for obtaining records to adjudicate covered claims, etc.

462.title: City of Jacksonville, Duval County
462.description: Adds special zone in downtown Jacksonville; provides exception from certain requirements for restaurant liquor licenses in zone.

464.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
464.title: Depositions in Juvenile Proceedings
464.description: Provides for time & location of deposition; provides procedures; provides for depositions of different categories of witnesses; provides that no disposition may be taken in certain cases; specifies factors to be considered in allowing deposition; allows use of deposition for impeachment; allows use of unintroduced portions of deposition in certain circumstances; authorizes sanctions for disobedience of subpoena; provides circumstances under which presence of child may be required, etc.

466.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
466.title: Foster Care Providers
466.description: Decreases limits of liability & requisite insurance coverage for lead community-based providers & subcontractors; provides immunity from liability for DCFS for acts or omissions of community-based provider or subcontractor, or officers, agents, or employees thereof.

467.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
467.title: Labor and Employment
467.description: Prohibits state agency from deducting from employee wages dues, uniform assessments, fines, penalties, or special assessments of employee organization or contributions made for purposes of political activity; prohibits county, municipality, or other local governmental entity from deducting from employee wages dues, uniform assessments, fines, penalties, or special assessments of employee organization or contributions made for purposes of political activity, etc.

468.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
468.title: Labor Organizations
468.description: Requires certain certified bargaining agents to recertify as employee organization by specified date.

469.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
469.title: Collective Bargaining
469.description: Authorizes employees who are members of labor organization to decertify labor organization or its certified bargaining agent; requires labor organizations to provide specified notice; provides members of labor organization with access to organization's accounting information; requires labor organizations to provide specified notice; provides for enforcement; provides for award of damages, injunctive relief, & civil penalties.

470.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
470.title: Pub. Rec./Law Enforcement/Firefighters
470.description: Expands public records exemption for specified personal information of spouses & children of active & former law enforcement & investigatory personnel; expands public records exemption for specified personal information of current or former firefighters & for their spouses & children; provides for future review & repeal of exemptions; provides statement of public necessity.

471.title: Interstate Compact for Juveniles
471.description: Reenacts provisions of compact notwithstanding repeal of those sections by s. 4, ch. 2005-80, Laws of Florida, effective 2 years after effective date of that act.

472.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
472.title: Collective Bargaining for Certain Public Employees
472.description: Specifies that for purposes of resolving impasse sheriff, tax collector, property appraiser, supervisor of elections, & clerk of circuit court are each deemed "legislative body" for their respective employees; provides that in county that has expressly abolished office of any constitutional officer, such duties are transferred to officer as provided for under county charter if charter is not inconsistent with general law or special law approved by vote of electors.

474.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
474.title: Condominium/Cooperative/Homeowners' Associations
474.description: Provides various provisions relating to specified condominium, cooperative, & homeowners' associations, including records, elections, fees, powers, duties, officers, meetings, notices, governance, foreclosure, liens, & bulk assignees & bulk buyers.

475.title: Continuing Care Retirement Communities
475.description: Provides for provision of continuing care at-home; defines "continuing care at-home," "nursing care," "personal services," & "shelter"; revises requirements for certificates of authority; requires person in business of issuing continuing care at-home contracts to obtain certificate of authority; requires written approval from OIR for 20 percent or more expansion in number of continuing care at-home contracts; provides actuarial study may be substituted for feasibility study; revises provisions relating to provisional certificates of authority, etc.

477.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
477.title: Pinellas Planning Council, Pinellas County
477.description: Codifies, amends, reenacts, & repeals district's special acts; reorganizes council; provides intent that countywide plan be broadly defined & policy-based; provides that primary focus of council be land use & transportation planning; provides that membership of council be same as that of county MPO; provides for election of officers, council meetings, quorum requirements, & member expenses; provides for council powers & duties, including revising required components of countywide plan, consistent with stated legislative intent, etc.

478.title: Citrus County
478.description: Codifies, amends, reenacts, & repeals special acts relating to Citrus County Hospital Board; authorizes hospital board to enter into lease or contract with not-for-profit corporation to operate & manage hospital & its facilities; declares need for governance authority to fulfill hospital board's public responsibilities; provides for board of directors; requires not-for-profit corporation to conform governance documents to certain requirements; authorizes ad valorem taxation, etc.

479.title: Loxahatchee Groves Water Control Dist./Palm Beach
479.description: Provides for dedication of width of roads to public; provides dedication requirements; provides for prima facie evidence of public road easements; exempts certain property of electric company; assigns traffic control jurisdiction on all public roads within district to Town of Loxahatchee Groves.

480.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
480.title: Pinellas County
480.description: Redefines "family day care home" & defines "large family child care home"; revises & provides requirements for licensure & regulation of such homes.

482.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
482.title: Special Election
482.description: Provides for special election to be held on date of presidential preference primary in 2012, pursuant to s. 5, Art. XI of State Constitution, for approval or rejection by electors of state of amendments to State Constitution, proposed by joint resolution, to prohibit increases in assessed value of homestead property if fair market value of property decreases, reduce limitation on annual assessment increases applicable to nonhomestead real property, etc. APPROPRIATION:

483.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
483.title: Community Residential Homes
483.description: Amends provisions relating to site selection of community residential homes; revises definition of "community residential home" & defines "sober house transitional living home"; requires supervision of residents of such home; requires sober house transitional living home to comply with standards of occupancy set by local government; provides restrictions on provision of onsite substance abuse treatment services; limits applicability.

484.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
484.title: Regulation of Hoisting Equipment
484.description: Defines terms "hoisting equipment," "mobile crane," & "tower crane"; requires applicant for building permit to submit certain information to local building official; requires radio communications between certain crane operators; requires certain preparations for hurricane or high-wind event; requires preparedness plan for certain cranes; requires that hoisting equipment be secured in specified manner; provides penalties for violation of act by certain licensed contractors, etc.

485.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
485.title: Request for Information by Department of Lottery
485.description: Requires Department of Lottery to issue request for information to determine feasibility of entering into management agreement with manager to provide management services to department; requires report to Governor, President of Senate, & Speaker of House of Representatives.

486.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
486.title: Treatment of Stroke
486.description: Provides duties for AHCA with regard to statewide system for stroke response & treatment; requires agency to establish Stroke Task Force; provides duties of task force; requires primary & comprehensive stroke centers & certain medical facilities to report certain data regarding stroke patients to private, tier-one research university in this state & requires university to maintain reported data & compiled information & statistics in registry, etc.

487.title: Canaveral Port District, Brevard County
487.description: Increases amount for which Canaveral Port Authority may encumber personal properties & facilities; increases amount for which contracts for construction, improvement, repair, or building may be entered into or goods, supplies, or materials may be purchased by district or authority.

488.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
488.title: Public Meetings/Discussions of Pending Litigation
488.description: Revises exception to public meetings law that allows specified governmental entities & chief administrative or executive officers thereof to meet in private with entity's attorney to discuss specified pending litigation; expands exception to include public employees or agents who possess relevant information needed by entity's attorney among those authorized to attend such private meeting; revises condition precedent to such private meeting; provides for legislative review & repeal of exemption; provides statement of public necessity.

489.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
489.title: Death and Fetal Death Registration
489.description: Provides for physician assistants & advanced registered nurse practitioners to provide certification of death or fetal death under certain conditions; requires supervising physician to verify certification within specified timeframe.

490.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
490.title: Capital Investment Tax Credit
490.description: Specifies procedures to claim sales & use tax credit; authorizes qualifying business that has insufficient corporate income tax liability to fully claim capital investment tax credit to apply credit against its liability for sales & use taxes to be collected, reported, & remitted to DOR; requires qualifying business that receives credit against its sales & use tax liability to make additional capital investments; requires qualifying business to annually report its capital investments to OTTED, President of Senate, & Speaker of House, etc.

491.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
491.title: Voting Conflicts
491.description: Designates act "Restoring Trust in Government Act"; provides exception to provisions relating to voting conflicts; prohibits member of Legislature from voting upon or participating in legislation inuring to personal gain or loss of member or his or her relative; prohibits member of Legislature from participating in any legislation inuring to personal gain or loss of business associate, employer, board on which member sits, principal by whom member is retained, or parent corporation or subsidiary of such principal; provides disclosure requirements.

492.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
492.title: Public School Instruction
492.description: Requires DOE guidelines for school district parent guide to include information regarding parental permission for certain instruction; authorizes school district to include parental consent form in parent guide; revises required instruction relating to comprehensive health education; specifies that student needs parental permission to be taught reproductive health or sexually transmitted disease education.

494.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
494.title: Energy Conservation Standards
494.description: Expands list of products covered under certain energy conservation standards to include nonresidential roofs, hardscapes, & related materials; provides energy conservation standards for nonresidential roofs, hardscapes, & related materials.

495.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
495.title: Agency for Persons with Disabilities
495.description: Provides that final order authority rests with APD after hearing on Medicaid programs administered by AHCA is conducted by DCFS; establishing direct-support organization for APD; requires unlicensed direct service provider who administers medications or supervises self-administration of medications to be assessed annually for competency in all allowed routes of administration before assisting with that route.

496.title: Women's Health
496.description: Creates "Kelly Smith Gynecologic & Ovarian Cancer Education & Awareness Act"; requires DOH to disseminate & display information about gynecologic cancers; requires department to encourage women to discuss risks of gynecologic cancers with their health care providers; requires State Surgeon General to post link to gynecologic cancer information on CDC Internet website; encourages DOH to seek any available funds to promote gynecologic cancer awareness, etc.

497.title: Insurance
497.description: Authorizes payment of workers' compensation benefits on prepaid card under certain circumstances; revises dates applicable to calculations of annual assessments upon certain workers' compensation insurers relating to special disability trust fund; provides exemption from having to obtain certificate of authority to insurers that cover only nonresidents of U.S. under certain conditions; requires funds collected for insurer to be held in bank insured by FDIC, etc.

498.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
498.title: Landlord and Tenant
498.description: Provides exclusion from application for person not legally entitled to occupy premises.

499.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
499.title: Sale of Event Tickets
499.description: Provides legislative intent & purpose; defines terms; requires original seller of tickets to event held at publicly owned venue to keep all receipts from ticket sales until event occurs or to require person or entity seeking advance release of ticket sales to post surety bond; provides that ticket purchaser is entitled to refund for canceled event; provides exceptions.

500.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
500.title: Issuance of Bonds
500.description: Revises provisions relating to schedule of maturities, time period for retirement, & calling of bonds issued by district school board.

503.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
503.title: Treatment of a Surrendered Newborn Infant
503.description: Presumes that birth mother of surrendered newborn infant is eligible for coverage under Medicaid as is the infant.

504.title: Apportionment
504.description: Requires Legislature to disclose & provide to Secretary of State certain information regarding legal services procured for purposes of reapportionment; requires that Secretary of State make such information available to public by publishing it on Secretary of State's website.

505.title: Family Law
505.description: Designates Department of Revenue as support enforcement agency of this state; revises provisions relating to remedies provided by act; provides for applicability of provisions to residents of foreign counties & foreign support proceedings; provides that specified bases of personal jurisdiction may not be used to acquire personal jurisdiction for certain purposes unless specified requirements are met; provides for duration of personal jurisdiction; deletes provisions relating to procedure when exercising jurisdiction over nonresident, etc.

506.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
506.title: Clerks of Circuit Court
506.description: Requires that budget request from clerk of court be based on projected case activity for each core service; deletes requirement that Florida Clerks of Court Operations Corporation make certain estimate; deletes requirement that corporation decrease amount of funds to be released to clerk of court if clerk performed fewer service units in previous quarters than estimated.

507.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
507.title: Cemeteries
507.description: Exempts from provisions governing cemeteries columbarium of specified size located on property of specified motorsports entertainment complex; requires that owner & subsequent owners of such complex ensure that columbarium is constructed & perpetually kept & maintained in certain manner, subject to certain provisions.

508.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
508.title: Interstate Health Insurance Policies
508.description: Authorizes solicitation & sale of interstate health insurance policies in this state by certain persons; provides definition; requires interstate health insurance policies & policy applications to contain certain notice; provides for application of certain provisions to certain insurers; excludes interstate health insurance policies from certain requirements; exempts interstate health insurance policies & applications from certain Florida Insurance Code provisions.

509.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
509.title: Local Government Energy Zones
509.description: Authorizes local governments to create energy zones by ordinance; authorizes retail sales by any producer of renewable energy within energy zones; requires utilities to offer disconnectable rate structure; provides for waiver of certain fees; requires PSC to adopt rules to govern sales by producers of renewable energy within energy zones & to submit reports to Legislature.

510.title: Financial Institutions
510.description: Authorizes Office Of Financial Regulation (OFR) to appoint provisional directors or executive officers; specifies which accounting principles must be followed by financial institutions; authorizes OFR to conduct additional examinations of financial institutions if warranted; revises criteria for approval of financial entity's plan of conversion; provides for transfer of assets from federally chartered or out-of-state chartered institution; revises provisions relating to banker's banks, etc.

511.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
511.title: Corrections
511.description: Provides alternative adjudication for alleged adult offenders meeting specified requirements; provides requirements for alternative adjudication programs; provides for removal from alternative adjudication; provides requirements for phase one of program; provides for removal from alternative adjudication; provides for offender receiving high school diploma; requires successful completion of basic training course; provides for phase two of program; provides for job skills training; provides for phase three of program, etc.

512.title: Health and Human Services
512.description: Provides exemption from review by AHCA & requirement to file application for certificate of need with agency for certain Level III neonatal intensive care units under certain circumstances; removes limitation on eligibility for enrollment in approved health flex plan; revises definition of term "health care provider" to include orthotists, orthotic fitters, orthotic fitter assistants, pedorthists, & prosthetists; revises eligibility requirements for participation in Florida Health Choices Program, etc.

513.title: Abortions
513.description: Requires that ultrasound be performed on woman obtaining abortion; requires that ultrasound be reviewed with patient before woman gives informed consent for abortion procedure; requires that woman certify in writing that she declined to review ultrasound & did so of her own free will & without undue influence; provides exemption from requirement to view ultrasound for women who are victims of rape, incest, domestic violence, or human trafficking or for women who have serious medical condition necessitating abortion, etc.

514.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
514.title: Stimulating Small Business Growth
514.description: Authorizes tax credit of specified amount for application against corporate income tax for certain corporations engaging in contractual business relationships with certain small businesses; specifies eligibility requirements; provides limitations on use of tax credit; authorizes OTTED & DOR to adopt rules.

516.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
516.title: Medicaid
516.description: Authorizes AHCA, in collaboration with DOH, to develop home & community-based services Medicaid waiver program to serve children diagnosed with Trisomy 18, subject to federal waiver approval; provides rulemaking authority.

517.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
517.title: Emergency Vehicles
517.description: Increases fine for failure to comply with specified provisions relating to yielding to emergency vehicles.

518.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
518.title: Assisted Living Facilities
518.description: Creates Florida Assisted Living Quality Improvement Initiative Pilot Project; authorizes AHCA to create pilot projects in area offices; permits licensed assisted living facilities to enroll in pilot project; establishes quality improvement teams to evaluate pilot projects & provides duties for teams; provides procedures for investigating & monitoring complaints; requires AHCA to develop assessment tool to evaluate project; requires report; provides for expiration of the pilot project.

519.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
519.title: Retirement for Elected Officials
519.description: Reduces employer retirement contribution for members of elected officers class.

520.title: Ad Valorem Tax Exemption/Deployed Servicemembers
520.description: Provides for servicemembers who receive homestead exemption & who are deployed in military operation to receive additional ad valorem tax exemption; designates military operations to receive additional ad valorem tax exemption; requires DOR to notify property appraisers & tax collectors of designated military operations; requires Department of Military Affairs to submit report annually of military operations to Legislature & tax committees of Legislature; specifies calculation to be used in determining exemption amount, etc.

521.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
521.title: Human Services
521.description: Allows national accreditation of human service providers to substitute for certain agency licensure & monitoring requirements; requires single lead agency to be responsible for monitoring human services delivery for designated populations; requires lead agency to develop monitoring protocols, develop plan for coordinating monitoring activities, adopt rules, provide list of required documents, & develop forms by certain date, etc.

522.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
522.title: Greyhound Racing
522.description: Provides that greyhound permitholder shall not be required to conduct minimum number of live performances; revises provisions relating to applications, converted permits & tax credits, tax exemptions or license fee credits, greyhound racing purses, intertrack wagering, slot machine gaming licenses & gaming areas, & cardroom licenses.

523.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
523.title: Pain-management Clinics
523.description: Provides specific standards of practice in pain-management clinics with regard to evaluations of patient's medical diagnosis, treatment plans, informed consent, agreements for treatment, physician's periodic review of patient, consultation, patient drug testing, patient medical records, denial or termination of controlled-substance therapy, facility & physical operations, infection control, health & safety, quality assurance, & data collection & reporting; provides responsibilities of designated physician & of clinic with respect to designated physician, etc.

524.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
524.title: Regulation of the Paralegal Profession
524.description: Requires Florida Supreme Court to establish program to require licensure of paralegals practicing in this state; requires that Supreme Court establish minimum standards & qualifications & provide for continuing education, certification, & professional conduct; requires Supreme Court to create independent board to assist in regulation of paralegals; provides penalties for unlicensed practice.

526.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
526.title: Transportation Project Funding
526.description: Redirects funds in State Transportation Trust Fund & portions of amounts contracted for construction projects of DOT to be used for prioritized projects.

528.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
528.title: Bullying or Harassment
528.description: Requires DOE to create model policy designed to protect students from bullying & harassment; requires public K-12 educational institution to designate school employee as counselor for students suffering from bullying or harassment; requires DOE to approve, produce, & provide training materials.

529.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
529.title: Business Enterprise Opportunities/Wartime Veterans
529.description: Revises legislative intent; renames & revises Florida Service-Disabled Veteran Business Enterprise Opportunity Act to expand vendor preference in state contracting to include certain businesses owned & operated by wartime veterans.

530.title: Ad Valorem Taxation
530.description: Reduces amount by which any change in value of nonhomestead residential property resulting from annual reassessment may exceed assessed value of property for prior year; reduces amount by which any change in value of certain residential & nonresidential real property resulting from annual reassessment may exceed assessed value of property for prior year; provides first-time Florida homesteader with additional homestead exemption; provides for calculation of exemption; provides for applicability period of exemption, etc.

533.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
533.title: Pub. Rec./Insurance
533.description: Provides exemption from public records requirements for notice of proposed divestiture in domestic insurer provided to Commissioner of Insurance pursuant to acquisition of domestic stock insurer; specifies duration of exemption; provides exemption from public records requirements for identity of lender pursuant to merger or other acquisition of control of domestic stock insurer where source of consideration is loan made in lender's ordinary course of business, upon request of lender; provides for review & repeal of exemptions, etc.

534.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
534.title: Long-Term Care Ombudsman Program
534.description: Revises duties of local ombudsman councils with respect to reports of complaints or problems; revises conditions for AHCA to conduct onsite facility reviews; eliminates role of State Long-Term Care Ombudsman Council in evaluating nursing facility for Gold Seal Program.

535.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
535.title: Enforcement/County & Municipal Codes & Ordinances
535.description: Revises provisions relating to delivery of notices for code violations; authorizes immediate issuance of citations for specified code violations; provides municipalities with certain authority relating to foreclosure on abatement assessment liens against real property & assignment of such liens to private parties.

536.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
536.title: Energy Economic Zones
536.description: Requires DCA to include in its report on Energy Economic Zone Pilot Program information relating to incentives available under program; exempts certain building materials used in construction or rehabilitation of energy-efficient structures & clean energy technology & manufacturing products from tax on sales, use, & other transactions; exempts energy economic zones from minimum wage requirements, etc.

537.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
537.title: Elderly Inmates
537.description: Creates Elderly Rehabilitated Inmate Supervision Program authorizing Parole Commission to approve early release of certain elderly inmates; authorizes public to be present at meetings held to determine inmate's eligibility; authorizes victim statement; requires notice to victim or victim's family; provides eligibility requirements; requires interview within specified time; requires examiner to explain & review certain criteria; provides conditions under which inmate may not be released; requires terms & conditions of release, etc.

541.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
541.title: Civil Remedies Against Insurers
541.description: Revises provisions relating to civil actions against insurers; provides definition; revises grounds for bringing action based on insurer's failure to accept an offer to settle; provides who may bring action; provides requirements for bringing an action; provides for release of insured if insurer offers to settle third-party claim within specified time; provides insurer has affirmative defense if third-party claimant or insured fails to cooperate with insurer, etc.

543.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
543.title: Foreclosure Proceedings
543.description: Designates act "Florida Fair Foreclosure Act"; provides requirements for publication of notice of foreclosure sale; revises requirements for notice of sale; provides requirements for Internet notices; entitles mortgagors, county clerks, & circuit courts to rely on full or partial release, discharge, consent, joinder, subordination, satisfaction, or assignment of mortgage in certain circumstances; provides for estoppel certificate for mortgagor, upon request, etc.

546.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
546.title: Surgical Technology
546.description: Provides legislative intent; provides requirements for training & certification for surgical technologist; provides for continuing education requirements; provides contracting, employment & supervision guidelines for health care facility employing certified surgical technologist; allows licensed practitioner to perform surgical technology as long as such practitioner is performing within his or her scope of practice, etc.

547.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
547.title: Corporate Income Tax
547.description: Provides for apportionment of certain taxpayer's adjusted federal income solely by sales factor; provides for eligibility based on taxpayer's capital expenditures & number of full-time employees; provides application process; authorizes DOR to examine & verify that taxpayer has correctly apportioned its taxes; conforms provisions to changes made by act; authorizes OTTED to approve & revoke approval of application; provides for recapture of unpaid taxes, interest, & penalties; authorizes office & department to adopt rules.

548.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
548.title: Public Health
548.description: Creates Expedited Partner Therapy Pilot Project in Duval & Gadsden Counties; provides exemption from specified rules & statutory requirements for pilot program; provides for training of physicians & patient education; requires pilot project to be funded by existing revenues; provides for use of funds.

549.title: Decennial Census
549.description: Requires Legislature to adjust federal decennial census figures to include prisoners in geographic areas where they last resided before incarceration rather than facility where they were residing at time of federal census; requires DOC to provide report to Legislature listing certain information relating to prisoners in state correctional institutions & federal facilities.

550.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
550.title: Veterinary Practice
550.description: Defines term "limited service veterinary vaccination clinic"; revises terminology; requires that Board of Veterinary Medicine establish minimum standards for limited service veterinary vaccination clinics rather than limited service veterinary medical practices.

551.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
551.title: Cigarette Products of Nonsettling Manufacturers
551.description: Imposes fee on sale, receipt, purchase, possession, consumption, handling, distribution, & use of nonsettling manufacturer cigarettes that are required to have stamp affixed or stamp insignia applied to package of cigarettes on which tax is otherwise required to be paid; provides fee imposed is in addition to other privilege, license, fee, or tax required or imposed by state; prescribes methods to affix stamp or insignia to tobacco products; provides fee rate for nonsettling manufacturers, etc.

552.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
552.title: Taxation
552.description: Revises definitions of "petroleum product" & "pollutants" to merge them & exclude pesticides, ammonia, chlorine, lead-acid batteries, & specified solvents; revises provisions for collection & distribution of taxes imposed for pollutants; revises tax exemption, refund & credit provisions for petroleum products, solvents, & lead-acid batteries; revises provisions relating to service charges for collection of fuel taxes & distribution of funds from Fuel Tax Collection Trust Fund, etc.

553.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
553.title: State Financial Information
553.description: Requires Auditor General to annually provide to Legislature list of school districts that have failed to comply with certain financial transparency requirements; provides that Financial Management Information Board is responsible for information system; deletes provisions relating to Florida Financial Management Information System Coordinating Council; deletes references to functional owner subsystems; establishes Agency for Enterprise Business Services within DFS; provides duties of agency, etc.

554.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
554.title: Domestic Violence and Stalking
554.description: Removes terms "stalking" & "aggravated stalking" from definition of "violence" as it pertains to repeat violence, sexual violence, or dating violence; requires clerk of court to assess fee for filing petition for protection against repeat violence; authorizes court to require respondent to reimburse victim for fee; creates cause of action for injunction for protection against stalking or cyberstalking; creates Stalking & Cyberstalking Injunction Statewide Verification System within FDLE, etc.

555.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
555.title: Consumer Protection
555.description: Requires retail tire dealers to disclose to purchasers age of replacement tires & certain warnings relating to age of tires; provides certain exceptions; provides that violation of act is deceptive & unfair trade practice; provides for deposit & use of certain funds; requires Attorney General's office to adopt rules.

556.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
556.title: Persons with Disabilities
556.description: Requires law enforcement agencies to report certain criminal activity & enforcement of certain regulations to FDLE & DHSMV; provides requirements for examination questions pertaining to traffic regulations relating to blind pedestrians; requires certain driver education programs & law enforcement officer basic skills course to include study of traffic laws to assist blind persons.

558.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
558.title: Corporate Income Taxes
558.description: Limits deductions of certain intangible expenses, licensing fees, & management fees paid by taxpayer to related entity; creates exceptions to limitations on deductions; requires adjustment of income of related entity; limits number of times certain items may be added or subtracted from taxable income; specifies information relating to transactions with related entities which must be contained in corporate income tax return, etc.

559.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
559.title: Education Savings Account Program
