559.description: Creates Education Savings Account Program to allow payment to participating student's account equal to percentage of amount student would have generated under FEFP, which would be deposited in financial institution to be used for child's education; provides eligibility requirements for students, schools & programs, & financial institutions to participate in program; provides qualified uses of funds in education savings account; provides responsibilities of parents, students, financial institutions, DOE, & Chief Financial Officer.

560.last_action: Laid on Table, companion bill(s) passed, see CS/CS/CS/SB 1816 (Ch.
560.title: Surplus Lines Insurance
560.description: Requires surplus lines agent to file quarterly affidavit stating all surplus lines insurance transacted during preceding quarter has been submitted to Florida Surplus Lines Service Office (FSLSO); requires premium tax due on surplus lines policy to be computed on gross premium; provides limit on tax; revises payment dates for service fee; requires service fee to be computed on gross premium; authorizes DFS & OIR to enter into agreement with other states for collection & allocation of nonadmitted insurance taxes, etc.

561.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
561.title: Title Insurance
561.description: Provides legislative intent requiring DFS to review regulatory structure of title insurance industry & submit findings & recommendations to Legislature; repeals provision requiring assessments against title insurers; requires rehabilitation plans to provide for specified matters; provides methodology for allocation of funds to pay claims on out-of-state policies; provides procedures & requirements for imposition & payment of assessments; provides methodology for determining assessment amounts, etc.

562.title: Telecommunications
562.description: Creates "Regulatory Reform Act"; revises & repeals provisions relating to Public Service Commission & telecommunication companies, facilities, & services; requires commission to initiate rulemaking to reduce regulatory assessment fee for telecommunications companies & produce annual report describing its efforts to do so.

564.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
564.title: Captive Insurance
564.description: Expands kinds of insurance for which captive insurer may seek licensure; limits risks that certain captive insurers may insure; specifies requirements & conditions relating to captive insurer's authority to conduct business; requires that before licensure certain captive insurers must file or submit to Commissioner of Insurance Regulation specified information, documents, & statements; requires captive insurance company to file evidence with commissioner relating to financial condition & quality of management & operations of company, etc.

565.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
565.title: Legal and Medical Referral Service Advertising
565.description: Requires advertising from medical or lawyer referral service related to motor vehicle accidents to comply with certain requirements regarding content; requires advertisements or unsolicited written communications from certain legal referral services related to motor vehicle accidents to comply with Supreme Court of Florida's Rules Regulating The Florida Bar; requires that published advertisements from lawyer referral service be filed with The Florida Bar along with affidavit meeting certain criteria, etc.

566.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
566.title: Jack Nicklaus Golf Trail of Florida
566.description: Requires DEP's Division of Recreation & Parks to establish & supervise operation of Jack Nicklaus Golf Trail of Florida; requires construction of public golf facility in each park region; provides for locations & amenities of public golf facilities; requires division to contract with golf course development company for design, construction, & development of, & enter into long-term lease for operation of, public golf facilities; provides qualifications for golf course development company, etc.

567.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
567.title: Independent Living
567.description: Requires court to retain jurisdiction over child until child is 21 years of age if child elects to receive Foundations First Program services; requires DCFS or community-based provider to provide reimbursement for costs of transportation provided for child in care; provides penalties for caregivers who refuse or fail to ensure that child attends school regularly; requires that child be provided with information relating to Road-to-Independence Program; provides that child with disability may stay in school until 22 years of age, etc.

568.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
568.title: Citizens Property Insurance Corporation
568.description: Revises legislative intent; provides certain residential structures are not eligible for coverage by corporation after certain date; prohibits corporation from levying assessments until surcharge is levied; requires corporation to commission consultant to prepare report on outsourcing; revises wind coverage provisions; specifies that corporation's insurance policies must provide that surplus lines insurer's offer to cover risks makes policy ineligible for renewal, etc.

570.title: Parental Notice of Abortion
570.description: Revises definition of term "constructive notice"; revises notice requirements relating to termination of pregnancy of minor; provides exceptions to notice requirements; revises procedure for judicial waiver of notice; provides for minor to petition for hearing within specified time; provides that in hearing relating to waiving requirement for parental notice, court consider certain additional factors, including whether minor's decision to terminate her pregnancy was due to undue influence; provides procedure for appeal if judicial waiver of notice is not granted, etc.

571.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
571.title: Career Education
571.description: Revises career & education planning course for middle grades promotion; provides requirements for high school career diploma; requires student & parent to agree in writing to requirements of career diploma track; specifies 24 credits that must be successfully completed to receive career diploma; requires intensive reading course or remediation in mathematics for student who does not meet certain academic standards; provides strategies to enable exceptional student to meet graduation requirements for career diploma, etc.

572.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
572.title: Domestic Violence
572.description: Revises definition of term "career offender" for purposes of Florida Career Offender Registration Act to include severe domestic violence offenders; defines term "severe domestic violence offender"; subjects such offenders to registration provisions of act.

573.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
573.title: Auditory-oral Education Programs
573.description: Cites this act as the "Auditory Oral-Education Act." Revises provisions relating to public school choice options for parents of public school students to include auditory-oral education programs. Provides that a parent of a child who is deaf or hard of hearing may enroll the child in an auditory-oral education program at a school accredited by OPTION Schools, Inc., or at a school in which the supervisor and the majority of faculty are certified as Listening and Spoken Language Specialists by the AG Bell Academy for Listening and Spoken Language, etc.

574.title: Education Accountability
574.description: Revises numerous provisions relating to K-12 public education system; revises provisions relating to virtual instruction courses & school board member acceptance of gifts; adds auditory-oral education programs to list of public school choice options; revises provisions relating to Opportunity Scholarship Program, McKay Scholarships, Voluntary Prekindergarten Education Program, special education services, requirements for middle grades promotion & high school graduation, digital curriculum, career & professional academies, etc.

575.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
575.title: Elected Officials
575.description: Requires Commission on Ethics & Elections Commission to notify CFO or governing body of county, municipality, or special district, as appropriate, of any fines owed to it by person who has been elected to state, county, municipal, or special district office; requires CFO or governing body of county, municipality, or special district, as appropriate, to withhold salary payments it would otherwise make to elected officeholder when that official owes fine to Commission on Ethics or Elections Commission, etc.

576.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
576.title: Election Ballots
576.description: Revises terminology relating to election ballots; transfers to new subsection requirements applicable to joint resolutions; provides that joint resolution may include ballot summary or alternate ballot summaries, listed in order of preference, describing chief purpose of amendment or revision in clear & unambiguous language; requires joint resolution to specify placement on ballot of ballot title & either ballot summary embodied in joint resolution or full text of proposed amendment or revision, etc.

577.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
577.title: Trucking
577.description: Cites act as "Small Trucker Relief Act"; creates Trucking Regulation Workgroup to develop report concerning rules & regulations affecting small trucking firms.

578.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
578.title: Tanning Facilities
578.description: Requires that operator or proprietor of tanning facility witness signing of written statement by parent or legal guardian of minor before minor is allowed to use tanning device; provides requirements for written statement; prohibits minor younger than certain age from using tanning device at tanning facility; deletes provisions authorizing use of tanning device by certain minors if accompanied by parent or legal guardian; allows use of tanning device by certain minors as treatment prescribed by health care provider.

580.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
580.title: Revitalizing Municipalities
580.description: Provides for transfer of sales tax revenues from General Revenue Fund to Revenue Sharing Trust Fund for Municipalities; provides for distribution from Revenue Sharing Trust Fund for Municipalities relating to increase in sales tax collections over preceding year to eligible designated redevelopment agency where sales tax increment redevelopment district is located; provides legislative intent & purpose; authorizes specified governing bodies to create sales tax increment redevelopment district within municipality having specified population, etc.

581.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
581.title: Dentistry
581.description: Provides that applicants licensed to practice dentistry in other states are entitled to take licensure examinations for licensure in this state; provides for expiration.

582.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
582.title: Application of Foreign Law
582.description: Defines term "foreign law, legal code, or system"; specifies public policy of this state in applying choice of foreign law, legal code, or system; declares that certain decisions rendered under such laws, codes, or systems are void; declares that certain choice of venue or forum provisions in contract are void; provides for construction of waiver by natural person of person's constitutional rights; declares that claims of forum non conveniens or related claims must be denied, etc.

585.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
585.title: Costs of Prosecution
585.description: Provides for remittance of costs of prosecution to specified trust fund; provides for allocation of funds in certain circumstances; provides for collection; provides for withholding of unpaid costs from return of cash bond; requires notice on bond forms of possible withholding; provides liability for cost of prosecution for persons whose cases are disposed of under specified provisions; requires courts to impose costs of prosecution & investigation; requires that costs of prosecution & investigation not be converted to court-ordered community service, etc.

586.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
586.title: Energy Efficiency
586.description: Provides for portion of proceeds of local government infrastructure surtax to be used to provide loans, grants, & rebates to residential property owners who make energy efficiency improvements to their residential property, subject to referendum; defines term "energy efficiency improvement."

587.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
587.title: Unemployment Compensation
587.description: Defines terms "community service" & "reemployment services"; provides that unemployed individual is eligible to receive benefits if she or he participates in community service program administered by one-stop career center.

588.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
588.title: Legislature
588.description: Requires Legislature to enact maps of state legislative & congressional districts by specified date in 2012.

589.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
589.title: Medicaid Eligibility
589.description: Provides asset transfer limitations for determination of eligibility for nursing facility services under Medicaid program after specified date; requires DCFS to take certain actions if community spouse refuses to make certain resources available to institutional spouse; authorizes AHCA to recover certain Medicaid expenses; authorizes DCFS to adopt rules.

590.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
590.title: State Employee Bonus Initiative
590.description: Creates State Employee Bonus Initiative, an online state employee suggestion program for reducing state government costs; provides duties of Legislative Budget Commission relating to program, including creating & maintaining program website; provides program requirements; provides for monetary award; protects employees from certain adverse & discriminatory actions; prohibits state agency heads & elected & appointed officials from participating in program, etc.

591.title: Brevard County
591.description: Authorizes Division of Alcoholic Beverages & Tobacco of Department of Business & Professional Regulation to issue an alcoholic beverage license to Brevard Art Museum, Inc., for use within museum's buildings; requires payment of license fee; provides for sale of beverages for consumption at museum; provides for transfer of license.

592.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
592.title: Assisted Living Communities
592.description: Revises licensing requirements for registered pharmacists under contract with nursing home & related health care facilities; creates pt. I of ch. 429, F.S., "Assisted Care Communities Licensing Procedures Act"; requires providers to have & display license; establishes license fees & conditions for assessment thereof; provides procedures for change of ownership; requires background screening of specified employees; provides for inspections & investigations to determine compliance.

593.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
593.title: Criminal History Records of Juveniles
593.description: Provides for automatic sealing of records of juvenile offenses upon completion of sentence; provides exceptions; provides for effect of sealing; provides for application of other specified provisions relating to expunction & sealing of records.

594.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
594.title: Pub. Rec./Juvenile History Records
594.description: Deletes provisions declaring that specified information concerning certain juvenile offenders not be considered confidential & exempt from s. 119.07(1), F.S.; provides for future legislative review & repeal of amendments & reversion of text under Open Government Sunset Review Act; provides statement of public necessity.

597.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
597.title: Gilchrist County
597.description: Authorizes school board to issue bonds, refunding bonds, & bond anticipation notes for certain purposes; requires school board to pay bond principal & premium out of certain racetrack, jai alai fronton, & other moneys; provides for investment of proceeds; provides referendum is not required.

598.title: City of Mount Dora, Lake County
598.description: Authorizes Division of Alcoholic Beverages & Tobacco of DBPR to issue temporary permits to nonprofit civic organization to sell alcoholic beverages for consumption on premises at outdoor events on public right-of-way in downtown Mount Dora, subject to certain statutory requirements; provides that such events require street-closure permit from city; provides that permits authorized by act are in addition to certain other authorized temporary permits; requires division to adopt rules.

599.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
599.title: Economic Recovery/Deepwater Horizon Disaster
599.description: Defines term "disproportionally affected county"; provides conditions under which Governor & OTTED may waive specified job, wage, & local financial support eligibility requirements; provides limitation; provides for qualified target industry business that relocates from another state to disproportionally affected county to receive certain tax refund payments; provides appropriation, etc. APPROPRIATION:

600.title: Walton County
600.description: Provides that certain rigid coastal armoring structures constructed during specified time may remain without need to obtain DEP permit; provides conditions.

601.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
601.title: Public-Private Partnerships
601.description: Establishes the Florida Public-Private Partnership Act; provides for private entities to develop & operate public-purpose projects; provides for procurement, consideration, & approval of projects; provides exemption from Consultant's Competitive Negotiation Act & any DMS interpretations, regulations, or guidelines; provides for affected local governments to comment on proposed projects; requires public entities to adopt & make publicly available specified guidelines for public-private agreements, etc.

602.title: Nassau County
602.description: Creates targeted job creation zone pilot project; authorizes county to designate specified areas as targeted job creation zones & to implement specified exceptions, strategies, & incentives; provides for alternative process for adoption & review of specified local government comprehensive plan amendments; provides for repeal of pilot project.

603.title: Certificates/Licenses/Health Care Practitioners
603.description: Provides for issuance of temporary license to specified health care practitioners who are spouses of active duty members of Armed Forces under certain circumstances; revises scope & area of practice for dental hygienists; adopts American Dental Licensing Examination as clinical or practical licensure examination used for licensure as dentist in this state, providing specified conditions are maintained; authorizes applicants to submit American Dental Licensing Examination scores from jurisdiction outside state, etc.

604.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
604.title: Pawnbroker and Secondhand Dealer Transactions
604.description: Transfers regulation of secondhand dealers from DOR to DOACS; revises recordkeeping requirements for pawnbroker & secondhand dealer transactions; revises requirements for contents & electronic transfer of pawnbroker & secondhand dealer transaction forms; requires pawnbrokers & secondhand dealers to transfer certain information to statewide central database; authorizes certain electronic records to be used as evidence; revises period for which secondhand dealers must maintain transaction records, etc.

605.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
605.title: Pub. Rec./Pawnbroker/Secondhand Dealer Transaction
605.description: Provides exemption from public records requirements for information contained in statewide central database of pawnbroker & secondhand dealer transactions administered by DOACS; limits use of information contained in database; authorizes certain persons to access database; provides for future review & repeal; authorizes disclosure of certain information by law enforcement officials; provides statement of public necessity.

606.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
606.title: Public School Food Service Enhancement
606.description: Authorizes district school board to enter into contract for sale of naming rights for public school cafeteria; provides for use of revenue generated by contract for sale.

607.title: McKay Scholarships/Students with Disabilities
607.description: Makes scholarships available to students with disabilities who have 504 accommodation plan issued under federal law; allows parent to request & receive scholarship for student to enroll in & attend private school if student has 504 accommodation plan; provides that students with certain temporary 504 accommodation plans are ineligible for scholarship; provides that parent may choose to enroll student in public school in adjacent district under certain conditions; provides for scholarship amounts.

608.title: School Choice
608.description: Revises requirements for eligibility to participate in Opportunity Scholarship Program; deletes provisions that authorize opportunity scholarship for attendance at private school; revises school district obligations & deletes provisions to conform; deletes obsolete provision relating to John M. McKay Scholarships for Students with Disabilities Program.

609.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
609.title: Licensed Security Officers
609.description: Provides that person who engages in any activity for which specified provision requires license, but acts without having license, commits first-degree misdemeanor; authorizes DOACS to impose civil penalty not to exceed specified amount; provides that person who impersonates security officer or other designated officer during commission of felony commits second-degree felony; provides increased penalties for subsequent violations & violations involving other circumstances, etc.

610.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
610.title: Weapons or Firearms
610.description: Prohibits possession of any firearm, electric weapon, or other specified device on property operated by school district; provides criminal penalties; amends & reenacts provisions relating to prohibited acts; clarifies that provisions prohibiting restrictions on firearms possession do not apply to restrictions on possession on property owned or operated by school district; bans possession, sale, transfer, or manufacture of high-capacity ammunition feeding devices; provides exceptions; provides criminal penalties.

611.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
611.title: Jurisdiction of the Courts
611.description: Authorizes service of process on Secretary of State if other representatives of corporation cannot be served; requires that process served on Secretary of State on behalf of defendant corporation be accompanied by fee & specified information; provides duties of Secretary of State concerning service of process; includes as additional basis for subjecting person to jurisdiction of courts of this state contract that designates law of this state as law governing & agreement to submit to this state's jurisdiction, etc.

613.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
613.title: Community Redevelopment
613.description: Expands definition of term "blighted area" to include land previously used as military facility.

614.title: Charlotte County Airport Authority/Charlotte Co.
614.description: Revises various provisions of Charlotte County Airport Authority Act; revises definitions; expands purpose of authority; revises provisions relating to members, officers, compensation, & meetings; revises powers of authority; revises requirements for expenditure of funds.

616.title: South Broward Drainage District, Broward County
616.description: Revises & provides definitions; conforms terminology; updates obsolete provisions; revises inconsistent provisions; revises method of deciding elections in event of a tie; clarifies language regarding imposition of district assessments & taxes; clarifies type of property subject to district rules, criteria, & regulations; authorizes board to take action required of district by another governmental agency; requires district to take water control elevations into consideration for all projects within district, etc.

617.last_action: Laid on Table, companion bill(s) passed, see SB 2160 (Ch.
617.title: Highway Safety and Motor Vehicles
617.description: Revises organization & operation of DHSMV; designates director of Highway Patrol as Colonel of Florida Highway Patrol; revises provisions relating to DUI, bicycles, license plates, child restraint devices, alternative procedures for disposition of traffic citation, driver improvement schools, certificates of title, electronic transactions, registration and renewal, specialty plates, voluntary contributions, temporary plates, temporary parking permit fees, salvage motor vehicle dealers, etc.

619.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
619.title: Tour-guide Services
619.description: Provides that regulation of tour-guide services in this state is solely responsibility of respective counties; deletes references to tour-guide services in provisions relating to certification of businesses, violations, & criminal penalties.

620.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
620.title: Transportation
620.description: Amends provisions relating to rulemaking; exempts adjustment of tolls under specified provisions from provisions requiring statement of estimated regulatory costs & requirement for legislative ratification; prohibits use of human-powered vehicles on limited access highways & bridges; requires Department of Transportation to establish pilot program to open certain limited access highways & bridges to bicycles & other human-powered vehicles; provides requirements for pilot program, etc.

621.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
621.title: Tax on Sales, Use, and other Transactions
621.description: Specifies period each year during which sales of certain energy-efficient products are exempt from tax; provides definitions; provides exceptions; authorizes DOR to adopt rules; provides appropriation. APPROPRIATION:

622.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
622.title: Drugs, Cosmetics, and Certain Devices
622.description: Requires DOH to notify applicant for prescription drug wholesale distributor permit or out-of-state prescription drug wholesale distributor permit of status of its permit application within specified period after receipt of all required documentation; deletes provisions relating to submission of bond or certain other security; revises permit application requirements to apply those requirements to all applicants & delete provisions specific to certain applicants.

623.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
623.title: Criminal History Records
623.description: Designates act "Jim King Keep Florida Working Act"; authorizes court to seal or expunge criminal history record of person who had prior criminal history record sealed or expunged in certain circumstances; authorizes person to lawfully deny or fail to acknowledge arrests & subsequent dispositions of sealed or expunged record; provides that person may fail to recite or acknowledge sealed or expunged criminal history record on employment application without committing certain violations, etc.

624.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
624.title: Billboard Regulation
624.description: Revises definitions relating to outdoor advertising; creates local tourist-oriented commerce signs pilot program; exempts signs placed under such program from certain permit requirements.

625.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
625.title: Condominiums
625.description: Specifies common elements for which right of use may be suspended by condominium association if unit owner is delinquent in paying monetary obligation.

626.title: Uniform Traffic Control
626.description: Provides for use of school bus traffic infraction detectors to enforce specified provisions requiring person driving vehicle to stop when approaching school bus displaying stop signal.

627.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
627.title: Judiciary
627.description: Repeals provisions relating to regular terms of Supreme Court; repeals provisions relating to terms of circuit courts; allows Supreme Court to set terms of court for Supreme Court, district courts of appeal, & circuit courts; provides that appellate courts may withdraw mandate within 120 days after issuance; provides state policy & legislative intent concerning government-funded pretrial release programs, etc.

628.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
628.title: Technology Seed Capital Fund
628.description: Provides for creation of Technology Seed Capital Fund by Institute for Commercialization of Public Research; provides for creation of fund management committee by board of directors of institute; forbids members of committee from investing in company for specified period after investment in company is approved; specifies responsibilities of institute & fund management committee with respect to fund; specifies requirements for investment management plan proposal from interested applicants for investment manager position, etc.

629.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
629.title: Pub. Rec./Technology Seed Capital Fund
629.description: Creates exemption from public records requirements for information relating to investments by Institute for Commercialization of Public Research through Technology Seed Capital Fund; provides exemption from public records requirements for information held by institute's fund management committee, etc.

630.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
630.title: Deaf and Hard-of-Hearing Children
630.description: Creates "Deaf and Hard-of-Hearing Children's Educational Bill of Rights"; provides findings & purpose; recognizes unique communication needs of deaf & hard-of-hearing children & encourages development of communication-driven & language-driven educational delivery system; requires DOE to develop communication model to become part of IEP process for deaf & hard-of-hearing students.

632.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
632.title: Utility Right-of-way Relocation
632.description: Revises provisions for removal or relocation of utility facilities that interfere with public roads or rail corridors; revises procedures; provides for payment of relocation expenses of certain facilities.

633.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
633.title: Firefighters' Relief/Pension Fund/Escambia Co.
633.description: Provides for compliance with applicable Internal Revenue Code requirements; adds optional forms of benefits; provides for retirement after 10 years of service; provides for death benefits for survivors; provides for protection of benefits from legal process; provides for rollover distributions; provides for additional benefits required by law; provides definitions; provides for maximum pension; provides for plan termination; provides for forfeitures.

635.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
635.title: Fighting or Baiting Animals
635.description: Provides rebuttable presumption that animal has been trained or used for fighting if certain facts are proven; provides that county or agency is not liable for cost of animal seized & awarded custody to county or agency pursuant to court order under specified provisions.

637.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
637.title: Debt Buyers
637.description: Provides definition for "debt buyer"; provides requirements for debt buyers; requires debt buyer to provide receipt for payments made by debtor; provides acts that are prohibited by debt buyer; provides requirements for filing action against debtor by debt buyer or for collecting attorney's fees charged for collection services; provides requirements for obtaining default or summary judgment against debtor; provides penalties against debt buyer for violations.

638.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
638.title: Medicaid Managed Care
638.description: Creates "Independence at Home Act"; directs AHCA to establish Independence at Home Chronic Care Coordination Pilot Project; provides for Independence at Home programs within pilot project; specifies objectives of programs; provides for implementation & independent evaluation of pilot project; provides eligibility criteria for participation; provides rulemaking authority to agency; provides for best-practices teleconferences; provides for enrollment of program participants; provides program & plan development requirements, etc.

640.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
640.title: Public Swimming Pools and Spas
640.description: Extends deadline for owners & operators of certain public swimming pools & spas to install specified safety feature.

641.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
641.title: Motor Vehicle Personal Injury Protection Insurance
641.description: Cites act as "Comprehensive Insurance Fraud Investigation and Prevention Act"; provides intent; revises provisions relating to crash reports; authorizes officer to testify at trial or provide affidavit; defines terms; revises requirements relating to form submitted by providers; revises provisions relating to payment; provides that time for paying or denying claim is tolled during investigation of fraudulent act; specifies when benefits are not payable; provides that claimant violating certain provisions is not entitled to payment, etc.

642.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
642.title: Department of Veterans' Affairs
642.description: Directs DVA to provide a plan & financial analysis by a certain date to the Governor, Cabinet, & Legislature regarding the transfer of the operations of DVA's veterans' homes to a public corporation.

643.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
643.title: Destination Resorts
643.description: Creates Integrated Destination Resort Commission within Department of Revenue to authorize & oversee limited gaming at up to five integrated destination resorts.

644.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
644.title: Trust Funds/Destination Resort Trust Fund/DOR
644.description: Creates Destination Resort Trust Fund within Department of Revenue; provides for purpose of trust fund; provides for future review & termination or re-creation of trust fund.

645.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
645.title: Pub. Rec./Destination Resort Commission
645.description: Provides exemption from public-records requirements for confidential & proprietary business information & trade secrets received by Destination Resort Commission & information that would reveal investigation techniques & procedures used by commission.

646.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
646.title: Foreclosure Debt Relief
646.description: Creates "Foreclosure Debt Claims Act"; provides definitions; authorizes creation & administration of deficiency judgment reimbursement program by Florida Housing Finance Corporation contingent upon occurrence of certain conditions precedent; provides for program's future termination; authorizes continuation of program subject to appropriations made after depletion of funds; provides procedures & eligibility requirements for homeowners & financial institutions to file monetary claims.

647.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
647.title: State Minimum Wage
647.description: Provides requirements for adjustment of state minimum wage.

650.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
650.title: Credit Counseling Services
650.description: Requires that debt management & credit counseling services be provided pursuant to debt management or debt settlement plan; requires credit counseling agency to make certain disclosures to debtor before debtor consents to payment; prohibits agency from making certain misrepresentations to debtor; provides certain conditions that agency must meet before receiving payment; provides that debtor may withdraw any account funds placed with agency at any time without penalty; authorizes agency to hold funds in order to allow funds to accumulate.

652.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
652.title: Professional Practices Involving Animals
652.description: Deletes provisions authorizing certain out-of-state & foreign professionals to engage in professional practices involving animals at certain sporting events; deletes provisions authorizing such professionals to have practice privileges in licensed veterinary & health care facilities.

653.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
653.title: Motor Vehicle Insurance
653.description: Revises provisions relating to proof of financial responsibility for rented or leased motor vehicles; provides lessors & lessees of rented & leased motor vehicles with certain responsibilities relating to provision & obtaining of liability insurance; revises who is deemed owner of motor vehicle for purposes of determining financial responsibility; revises applicability of certain provisions relating to financial responsibility of owner of commercial motor vehicles.

654.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
654.title: Class Size Requirements
654.description: Revises provisions relating to amount of penalties calculated by DOE when school district fails to comply with class size requirements; prohibits penalties from exceeding $1,000 per school in district.

655.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
655.title: Assault Battery/ Law Enforcement or Firefighters
655.description: Increases mandatory minimum term of imprisonment for battery of law enforcement officer or firefighter with firearm or destructive device or while possessing semiautomatic firearm & its high-capacity detachable box magazine, or machine gun.

656.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
656.title: Dan Marino Foundation Florida Vocational College
656.description: Establishes Dan Marino Foundation Florida Vocational College in Broward County as public residential postsecondary school for certain students who have developmental disabilities; provides funding for school through DOE subject to specific appropriation; requires school to comply with laws & rules applicable to state agencies unless otherwise provided by law.

657.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
657.title: Construction Liens and Bonds
657.description: Requires contractor to record payment bond for public works construction project; prohibits issuing authority for building permit or private provider performing inspection services from inspecting property being improved until certain documents are filed; provides that payment & performance bond is not required for certain contracts; authorizes certain entities to exempt certain contracts from requirement for payment & performance bond; requires contractor to serve notice of contest of claim against payment bond, etc.

658.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
658.title: Specialty License Plates
658.description: Creates Go Green license plate; establishes annual use fee for plate & provides for distribution of use fees received from sale of plates.

659.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
659.title: Municipal Water and Sewer Utilities
659.description: Prohibits certain municipalities from imposing certain surcharges on consumers outside their boundaries for provision of water or sewer utility services.

660.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
660.title: False Personation
660.description: Prohibits person from falsely personating firefighter or certain law enforcement officers if his or her action could deceive reasonable person into believing that he or she was bona fide official; prohibits operation or ownership of motor vehicle falsely marked in way which could deceive reasonable person into believing that such vehicle is authorized by fire department for use by person operating it; provides exception.

663.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
663.title: East Lake Tarpon Community, Pinellas County
663.description: Provides requirements for municipal annexation of East Lake Tarpon Community; requires referendum of electors within community prior to such annexation; provides exceptions; describes community boundaries; provides for expiration.

665.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
665.title: Educational Enhancement Funding
665.description: Revises provisions relating to Educational Enhancement Trust Fund & Lottery Capital Outlay & Debt Service Trust Fund to provide for redirection for classroom use & operations of portion of lottery funds appropriated each fiscal year for capital outlay & debt service.

666.title: Pub. Rec./Florida Health Choices Program
666.description: Creates exemption from public records requirements for personal, identifying information of enrollee or participant in Florida Health Choices Program; creates exemption from public records requirements for proprietary confidential business information of vendor; creates exemption from public records requirements for client & customer lists of program buyer's representative; provides exceptions; authorizes enrollee's legal guardian to obtain confirmation of certain information about enrollee's health plan; provides for retroactive application, etc.

667.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
667.title: Alimony
667.description: Revises provisions relating to factors to be considered for alimony awards; revises provisions relating to awards of durational alimony; revises provisions relating to awards of permanent alimony; provides that award of alimony may not leave payor with significantly less net income than net income of recipient unless there are written findings of exceptional circumstances; provides for applicability.

668.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
668.title: Trespass
668.description: Includes trespass on certain property of railway companies & mining companies within offense of trespass on property other than structure or conveyance; revises definition of term "cultivated land" for purposes of provisions relating to trespass.

669.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
669.title: Land Application of Septage
669.description: Terminates future imposition of prohibition of land application of septage from onsite sewage treatment & disposal systems.

670.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
670.title: Substance Abuse Education/Treatment Intervention
670.description: Provides for placement of certain misdemeanor controlled substance offenders in licensed substance abuse education & treatment intervention programs as standard condition of probation; provides that defendants found guilty of certain misdemeanor controlled substance offenses may be placed in licensed substance abuse education & treatment intervention programs; authorizes certain entities providing probation services to provide licensed substance abuse education & treatment intervention programs, etc.

671.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
671.title: High School Graduation Rates
671.description: Revises provisions relating to high school equivalency diploma program & school grading system to include students who receive high school equivalency diploma in high school graduation rates for purposes of determining school's grade.

673.title: Sebring Airport Authority, Highlands County
673.description: Revises powers of authority; provides that authority may establish, operate, & maintain foreign-trade zone status under alternative site framework in DeSoto, Glades, Hardee, Hendry, Highlands, & Okeechobee Counties & Cities of Belle Glade, Pahokee, & South Bay; expands power to purchase commodities or contractual services.

674.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
674.title: Growth Policy
674.description: Repeals Urban Infill & Redevelopment Assistance Grant Program.

675.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
675.title: Liens for Ginning Cotton
675.description: Repeals provisions relating to liens for labor or services in ginning cotton.

676.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
676.title: Legislative Records
676.description: Deletes provisions exempting from public disclosure certain records or information held by legislative branch & certain legislative draft documents & requests for those documents or advisory opinions.

677.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
677.title: Driver Licenses
677.description: Repeals provisions relating to effect of classified licensure on persons holding chauffeur's license; repeals provisions for licensure of such persons under appropriate license classification.

678.title: Outdoor Theaters
678.description: Repeals provisions relating to access to public roads from outdoor theaters; removes provisions for entrances, exits, enclosures, vehicle storage, screen orientation, tower location, & driveway lighting; removes requirements for issuance of occupational license by tax collector.

679.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
679.title: Dance Studios

680.title: Television Picture Tubes
680.description: Repeals provisions relating to television picture tube labeling requirements & misrepresentations of television picture tubes.

681.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
681.title: Telemarketing
681.description: Deletes restrictions on business-to-business sales exemption of Florida Telemarketing Act.

682.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
682.title: Adultery/Cohabitation/Lewd & Lascivious Behavior
682.description: Repeals provisions relating to living in open adultery; deletes language that made prohibition on couples lewdly & lasciviously associating & cohabiting together part of prohibition of lewd & lascivious behavior.

684.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
684.title: Water Vending Machines
684.description: Repeals provisions relating to regulation of water vending machines & permitting of water vending machine operators; deletes provisions for deposit of operator permitting fees, enforcement of state's water vending machine regulations, penalties, & preemption of county & municipal water vending machine regulations, to conform.

685.title: Sales Representative Contracts/Commissions
685.description: Repeals provisions relating to sales representative contracts involving commissions.

686.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
686.title: Yacht and Ship Brokers
686.description: Repeals Yacht & Ship Brokers' Act; removes provisions relating to licensing, escrow depository, closing transactions, & powers & duties of Division of Florida Condominiums, Timeshares, & Mobile Homes of Department of Business & Professional Regulation.

687.title: Obsolete Health Care Provisions
687.description: Repeals provisions relating to separate restrooms & dressing rooms for males & females, Florida Healthy People 2010 Program, & MedAccess program.

688.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
688.title: Transportation Corporations
688.description: Repeals Florida Transportation Corporation Act to remove provisions that provide for nonprofit corporations to act on behalf of DOT to secure & obtain rights-of-way for transportation systems & to assist in planning & design of such systems; removes provision for audits of such corporations by Auditor General to conform.

689.title: Local Government Services
689.description: Repeals statute relating to efficiency & accountability in local government services.

690.title: Florida Industrial Development Corporation
690.description: Repeals provisions relating to Florida Industrial Development Corporation.

691.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
691.title: Misdemeanor Pretrial Substance Abuse Programs
691.description: Provides that person who has previously been admitted to pretrial program may still qualify for voluntary admission to program.

692.last_action: Withdrawn from Criminal Justice Subcommittee; Judiciary Committee
692.title: Entry by Law Enforcement Officers
692.description: Deletes provisions authorizing law enforcement officer to use all necessary & reasonable force to enter building or property where person to be arrested is or is reasonably believed to be after officer has announced his or her authority & purpose.

693.last_action: Withdrawn from HHS Quality Subcommittee; Health and Human Services Committee
693.title: Hypnosis

694.last_action: Laid on Table, companion bill(s) passed, see CS/CS/SB 1346 (Ch.
694.title: Department of Children and Family Services
694.description: Removes provision prohibiting federal, state, county, or municipal officer from serving as employee of DCFS.

695.last_action: Withdrawn from Agriculture and Natural Resources Subcommittee; State Affairs Committee
695.title: Florida Agricultural Museum
695.description: Repeals provisions establishing Florida Agricultural Museum & deletes related provisions pertaining to museum in provisions relating to DOACS' direct-support organizations for certain programs.

704.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
704.title: State Long-Term Care Ombudsman Program
704.description: Repeals provision requiring collection, analysis, & publication of information from data reports regarding complaints about & conditions in long-term care facilities.

705.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
705.title: Nursing Home Quality and Licensure Status
705.description: Deletes criteria for recognition as Gold Seal Program facility.

706.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
706.title: Local Long-Term Care Ombudsman Councils
706.description: Repeals provisions relating to requirement that local long-term care ombudsman councils conduct onsite administrative assessments.

707.title: Residence of Clerk of the Circuit Court
707.description: Repeals provisions relating to clerk of circuit court's place of residence.

708.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
708.title: Firearms Purchases
708.description: Deletes language limiting purchase of rifles & shotguns to certain purchases in contiguous states.

783.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
783.title: Broward County Expressway Authority Law
783.description: Removes provisions that created & govern Broward County Expressway Authority.

784.title: Appropriations
784.description: Provides moneys for annual period beginning July 1, 2011, & ending June 30, 2012, to pay salaries, & other expenses, capital outlay - buildings, & other improvements, & for other specified purposes of various agencies of state government. APPROPRIATION:

785.title: Implementing 2011-2012 General Appropriations Act
785.description: Implements 2011-2012 GAA; requires DOE to distribute charter school capital outlay funding pursuant to certain provisions of law; provides that Public Education Capital Outlay & Debt Service Trust Fund be used as source of certain state match; authorizes DOC & DJJ to make certain expenditures to defray costs incurred in opening or operating facility; provides for additional positions; authorizes DLA to spend certain appropriated funds; delays expiration of provisions authorizing municipality to expend funds to reimburse its general fund, etc.

786.title: Deregulation of Professions and Occupations
786.description: Deletes provisions establishing Florida Board of Auctioneers & Motor Vehicle Repair Advisory Council, deletes provisions for regulation of yacht & ship brokers, auctioneers, talent agencies, athlete agents, persons practicing hair braiding, hair wrapping, or body wrapping, interior designers, professional fundraising consultants & solicitors, water vending machines & operators, health studios, ballroom dance studios, commercial telephone sellers & salespersons, movers & moving brokers, certain outdoor theaters, etc.

787.title: Reducing and Streamlining Regulations
787.description: Revises various provisions relating to professions & occupations regulated by DBPR or DOACS, including distribution of motor vehicle consumer's rights pamphlet; transfer of certain driver license information by DHSMV to DBPR; requirements for home inspectors, mold assessors & remediators, asbestos consultants & contractors & landscape architects; professional practice standards for real estate brokers & sales associates, etc.

788.title: Auditor General
788.description: Requires financial audits to be conducted in accordance with certain standards & activities; expands definition & standards of "operational audit"; revises duties pertaining to financial audits of boards of trustees of community colleges, school boards, universities, Florida Clerks of Court Operations Corporation, & Florida School for the Deaf and Blind; revises time for conducting certain audits; revises requirements for conducting performance audit of ad valorem tax laws, etc.

789.title: Commission on Capital Cases
789.description: Repeals provisions relating to creation of Commission on Capital Cases; provides for assumption of certain duties of Commission on Capital Cases by Justice Administrative Commission; conforms provisions.

790.title: State Employees
790.description: Provides for resolution of collective bargaining issues at impasse between State of Florida & certified bargaining units for state employees pursuant to specified instructions.

791.title: Office of Drug Control
791.description: Repeals provisions relating to creation of Office of Drug Control; places Statewide Office for Suicide Prevention within DCFS; redirects revenues; places Seaport Security Standards Advisory Council within EOG; places Statewide Drug Policy Advisory Council within DOH; conforms provisions.

792.title: Agency for Enterprise Information Technology
792.description: Revises duties & responsibilities of agency; removes provisions for Office of Information Security & Agency Chief Information Officers Council; revises provisions relating to Department of Corrections; provides for Department of Corrections' data system to be managed through its Office of Information Technology; removes reference to Justice Data Center; revises provisions for consolidation of agency information technology resources.

793.title: Prekindergarten through Grade 12 Education Funding
793.description: Conforms various provisions relating to prekindergarten through grade 12 education funding; revises provisions relating to charter schools, school district virtual instruction programs, Voluntary Prekindergarten Education Program, maximum class size, career education programs, instructional materials, value of certain student membership, & district millage levy & expenditures.

794.title: Postsecondary Education Funding
794.description: Conforms various provisions relating to postsecondary education funding; revises provisions relating to Florida Distance Learning Consortium, admissions application for transient students, fees for postsecondary education, Florida Bright Futures Scholarship Program, tuition assistance programs, funding for workforce education programs, & remuneration of public postsecondary education presidents & administrative employees.

796.title: Biomedical Research
796.description: Revises provisions that specify amounts of revenue to be appropriated to James & Esther King Biomedical Research Program, William G. "Bill" Bankhead, Jr., & David Coley Cancer Research Program, & H. Lee Moffitt Cancer Center & Research Institute; specifies amounts of revenue to be appropriated to Sylvester Comprehensive Cancer Center of University of Miami & University of Florida Shands Cancer Center. APPROPRIATION:

797.title: Correctional Medical Authority
797.description: Repeals provisions relating to Correctional Medical Authority definitions, creation, powers & duties, reports & surveys, dispute resolution, & enforcement; conforms provisions.

800.title: Medicaid Services
800.description: Repeals sunset of provisions authorizing federal waiver for certain persons age 65 & older or who have disability & provisions authorizing specified medically needy program; eliminates limit to services placed on medically needy program for pregnant women & children younger than age 21; eliminates adult Medicaid optional coverage for chiropractic & hearing services; updates formula used for calculating reimbursements to Medicaid providers for prescribed drugs; continues requirement that AHCA set certain institutional providers reimbursement rates, etc.

802.last_action: Died in Conference Committee, companion bill(s) passed, see SB 2000 (Ch.
802.title: Department of Corrections
802.description: Repeals provisions relating to youthful offender basic training program; revises definitions of "correctional probation officer" & "part-time correctional probation officer"; authorizes DOC to contract with private entity to supervise offenders on community supervision in Broward & Miami-Dade counties pursuant to GAA; provides contract requirements; provides exception to prohibition on private entities providing supervision services to certain offenders; provides for transfer of specified duties, functions, property, & funds from DMS to DOC, etc.

803.title: Trust Funds of the State Courts System
803.description: Redirects proceeds from part of certain filing fees from state courts' Mediation & Arbitration Trust Fund to State Courts Revenue Trust Fund; deletes obsolete provision relating to use of moneys in Mediation & Arbitration Trust Fund.

804.title: Juvenile Commitment
804.description: Revises language concerning active control over child committed to DJJ; prohibits court from committing certain youth at restrictiveness level other than minimum-risk nonresidential; authorizes court to commit certain youth to low or moderate risk residential placement; limits transfers of certain youth.

805.last_action: Died in Conference Committee, companion bill(s) passed, see SB 2000 (Ch.
805.title: Clerks of Court
805.description: Transfers Clerks of Court Trust Fund to DOR; provides additional powers & duties of LBC; revises distributions of filing fees for trial & appellate proceedings; deletes provisions providing for housing Florida Clerks of Court Operations Corporation within Justice Administrative Commission; revises membership of corporation's executive council; specifies that corporation is subject to certain procurement requirements; revises & expands budget duties & responsibilities of corporation, etc.

806.title: Department of Highway Safety and Motor Vehicles
806.description: Reorganizes department into two divisions; eliminates Division of Driver Licenses & Division of Motor Vehicles; establishes Division of Motorist Services; revises provisions for department to authorize tax collectors to act as agents for provision of driver's license services; provides for certain tax collectors to assume all driver's license issuance services; provides for tax collector to provide driver's license services for another county under interlocal agreement.

807.title: Public Employees Relations Commission
807.description: Requires commission to be comprised of chair & two part-time members; requires chair of commission to devote full time to commission duties & not engage in any other business, vocation, or employment while in such office; prohibits part-time members from engaging in any business, vocation, or employment that conflicts with their duties while in such office.

808.title: Department of Management Services
808.description: Revises provisions relating to reimbursement of DMS for actual costs of coordinating Florida State Employees' Charitable Campaign; provides for transfer of funds generated by fees collected for use of DMS's online procurement systems & electronic information services from DMS to DFS to support statewide purchasing operations; establishes amount of transfer; provides for annual transfer of specified excess revenue from fees collected for use of such systems & services to GR, etc.

809.title: Department of Financial Services
809.description: Revises duties of Division of Consumer Services; revises criteria for premiums charged to agencies & departments for purposes of State Risk Management Trust Fund; revises reporting requirements on state insurance program; requires Division of Risk Management to analyze & report on certain agency return-to-work programs & activities; requires certain agencies to establish & maintain return-to-work programs for certain employees; provides program goals, etc.

810.title: Water Pollution Control Loans and Grants
810.description: Provides for deposit of specified revenues into DEP's Federal Grants Trust Fund; requires service fees to be used for specified water quality activities in addition to program administration; clarifies purposes for which certain federal appropriations & state matching funds must be used.

814.title: Florida Statutes
814.description: Deletes provisions that have expired, have become obsolete, have had their effect, have served their purpose, or have been impliedly repealed or superseded; replaces incorrect cross-references & citations; corrects grammatical, typographical, & like errors; removes inconsistencies, redundancies, & unnecessary repetition in statutes; improves clarity of statutes & facilitates their correct interpretation, etc.

817.title: Official Florida Statutes
817.description: Adopts Florida Statutes 2011 & designates portions thereof that are to constitute official law of state; provides that Florida Statutes 2011 shall be effective immediately upon publication; provides that general laws enacted during 2010 regular session & prior thereto & not included in Florida Statutes 2011 are repealed; provides that general laws enacted during November 16, 2010, special session & 2011 regular session are not repealed by this adoption act.

818.title: Joint Legislative Organizations
818.description: Repeals provisions relating to OPPAGA, Joint Administrative Procedures Committee, Legislative Committee on Intergovernmental Relations, Joint Legislative Committee on Everglades Oversight, Florida Government Accountability Act, creation of joint select committee to review findings & recommendations of Century Commission for a Sustainable Florida for potential action, review of information technology resources needs & special monitoring process for designated information resources management projects, Committee on Public Counsel Oversight, etc.

819.title: Education Personnel
819.description: Cites act as "Student Success Act"; revises provisions relating to evaluation of instructional personnel & school administrators; requires DOE to approve school district's evaluation systems; requires Commissioner of Education to approve or select formulas for use in measuring student learning growth; revises provisions relating to compensation & salary schedules; provides criteria for employment contracts for newly hired instructional personnel, etc.

820.title: Impact Fees
820.description: Reenacts s. 163.31801(5), F.S., relating to burden of proof required by government in action challenging impact fee; provides legislative finding of important state interest; provides for retroactive operation; provides for exception under specified circumstances.

822.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
822.title: Court Rules of Process and Procedure
822.description: Provides that statutes supersede court rules; provides that court rule may not modify substantive right or conflict with general law; creates judicial conference; provides for creation & adoption of court rules, administrative orders, forms, & jury instructions; requires proposed rules to be published & heard before subcommittee, rules committee, & judicial conference before submission to Legislature; provides that rules go into effect if Legislature does not act; provides exceptions, etc.

823.last_action: Laid on Table, companion bill(s) passed, see SB 898 (Ch.
823.title: Office of State-Federal Relations
823.description: Requires Office of State-Federal Relations to submit annual report to Governor & legislative leadership.

824.last_action: Indefinitely postponed and withdrawn from consideration
824.title: Open Government Sunset Review Act
824.description: Corrects cross-references to repealed section of Florida Statutes under Open Government Sunset Review Act.

825.title: Certification of Minority Business Enterprises
825.description: Deletes provisions establishing Minority Business Certification Task Force, requiring that criteria for certification of minority business enterprises be approved by task force, & authorizing task force to amend statewide & interlocal agreement for certification of minority business enterprises.

826.description: Repeals authority of Governor to appoint & commission private secretary.

827.title: Trust Funds/Federal Grants Trust Fund/DEP
827.description: Re-creates Federal Grants Trust Fund within DEP without modification; abrogates provisions relating to termination of trust fund, to conform.

828.title: Operations Trust Fund/DOR
828.description: Re-creates & renames Operations Trust Fund within DOR; abrogates provisions relating to termination of trust fund, to conform.

829.title: Federal Grants Trust Fund/DOR
829.description: Re-creates Federal Grants Trust Fund within DOR without modification; abrogates provisions relating to termination of trust fund, to conform.

830.description: Creates Federal Grants Trust Fund within DFS; provides for purposes of trust fund & sources of funds; provides for future review & termination or re-creation of trust fund.
